alert.note: Alert for Tate; Tunica (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 3:51PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Tunica and western Tate Counties through 415 PM CDT... At 351 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Strayhorn, or 11 miles west of Senatobia, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Strayhorn, Arkabutla, Little Texas, Phillipp, Prichard, Sarah, Dooley and Savage. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
